timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
int count = 0;
for (APIRevision apiRevision: apiRevisionList) {
count++;
apiRevisionDTOS.add(fromAPIRevisiontoDTO(apiRevision));
}
apiRevisionListDTO.setCount(count);
for (APIRevision apiRevision: apiRevisionList) {
apiRevisionDTOS.add(fromAPIRevisiontoDTO(apiRevision));
}
apiRevisionListDTO.setCount(apiRevisionList.size());
